00021 #pragma once
00022 
00023 #include <stddef.h>
00024 namespace cxx {
00030 class Nothrow {};
00031 }
00032 
00039 inline void *operator new (size_t, void *mem, cxx::Nothrow const &) throw()
00040 { return mem; }
00041 
00046 void *operator new (size_t, cxx::Nothrow const &) throw();
00047 
00048 namespace cxx {
00049 
00050 
00059 template< typename _Type >
00060 class New_allocator
00061 {
00062 public:
00063   enum { can_free = true };
00064 
00065   New_allocator() throw() {}
00066   New_allocator(New_allocator const &) throw() {}
00067 
00068   ~New_allocator() throw() {}
00069   
00070   _Type *alloc() throw()
00071   { return static_cast<_Type*>(::operator new(sizeof (_Type), cxx::Nothrow())); }
00072   
00073   void free(_Type *t) throw()
00074   { ::operator delete(t); }
00075 };
00076 
00077 }
